content: above and below the scrap yarn be sure it s half of your stitch count unravel the scrap yarn or trim it k across one side of the heel pick up two stitches on this side k across the other side of the heel and pick up the same amount of sts on the other corner k two other row in stockinette work in the round to decrease - r1 *k1 ssk k until 3 sts left on the needle k2tog k1* repeat ** on the other needle - r2 k all sts repeat row 1 and 2 until you have 18 sts left divided on the two needles close the heel using a kitchener stitch https //youtu be/qwl2ob4anog si=hwtrubmmvql42o4e cut the yarn and thread it on a needle go through the first st of bottom needle knitwise and take off the knitting needle go through the second st purlwise and leave on go through the first st of top needle purlwise and take off go through the second st knitwise and leave on continue till end repeat for the second sock weave in all ends and block your socks thank you for using this pattern and for any questions write to me on instagram @lison knits this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only
